sentences.english: Honest, positive, detailed and courage to meet challenge.
sentences.chinese: 誠篤，踊躍，仔細，敢於接管挑戰。

sentences.english: I will pardon you, who are honest.
sentences.chinese: 我願意饒恕你，你是誠篤的。

sentences.english: He is very honest, that's why I believe in what he says.
sentences.chinese: 他很誠篤，所以我信賴他說的話。
誠篤，但要保持正面姿勢。
“湯姆很生氣，”但這是不誠篤的。

sentences.english: In her grief, Elizabeth was comforted by a 16)stalwart monk called Markus.
sentences.chinese: 這時，誠篤的僧侶馬庫斯安慰哀傷的伊麗莎白。

sentences.english: Honestly and diligence should be your eternal mates.
sentences.chinese: 誠篤與勤奮成爲你永久的朋友。

sentences.english: He seems to believe Buddhism, but never have faith in it.
sentences.chinese: 他似乎信佛，但從不曾誠篤於佛。

sentences.english: It is true that most of them try to acquire wealth by means of honest labour.
sentences.chinese: 的確，大大都人高興經過誠篤的辦事來獲取財產。

sentences.english: A partner or friend is willing to match the energy and intensity that you put into the relationship.
sentences.chinese: 夥伴或朋友是願意以同等迴應你投入的精力和誠篤的。

sentences.english: I can't answer for it that the boy is honest.
sentences.chinese: 我不克不及保證這個男孩是誠篤的。
